org.mozilla.geckoview

Class ContentBlockingController.ExceptionList

  • Object
    • org.mozilla.geckoview.ContentBlockingController.ExceptionList
  • Enclosing class:
    ContentBlockingController

    @AnyThread
public class ContentBlockingController.ExceptionList
extends Object
    ExceptionList represents a content blocking exception list exported from Gecko. It can be used to persist the list or to inspect the URIs present in the list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExceptionList(JSONObject savedList)
      Creates a new exception list from a JSONObject.
      ExceptionList(String savedList)
      Creates a new exception list from a string.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the URIs currently on the content blocking exception list.
      JSONObject toJson()
      Returns a JSONObject representation of the content blocking exception list.
      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the content blocking exception list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExceptionList

        public ExceptionList(@NonNull
                     String savedList)
              throws JSONException
        Creates a new exception list from a string. The string should be valid output from toString.
        Parameters:
        savedList - A string representation of a saved exception list.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the string representation no longer represents valid JSON.

      • ExceptionList

        public ExceptionList(@NonNull
                     JSONObject savedList)
              throws JSONException
        Creates a new exception list from a JSONObject. The JSONObject should be valid output from toJson.
        Parameters:
        savedList - A JSONObject representation of a saved exception list.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the JSONObject cannot be converted for any reason.

    • Method Detail

      • getUris

        @NonNull
public String[] getUris()
        Returns the URIs currently on the content blocking exception list.
        Returns:
        A string array containing the URIs.

      • toString

        @Nullable
public String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the content blocking exception list. May be null if the JSON to string conversion fails for any reason.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

public JSONObject toJson()
